error.message: Call to deprecated method registerLoader() of class Doctrine\Common\Annotations\AnnotationRegistry: This method is deprecated and will be removed in doctrine/annotations 2.0. Annotations will be autoloaded in 2.0.
Parameter $twig of method Drupal\potion\Extractor\TwigExtractor::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Environment: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Environment" instead
Class Drupal\potion\Twig\Extension\TransExtractorExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Parameter $env of method Drupal\potion\Twig\NodeVisitor\TranslationNodeVisitor::doEnterNode() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Environment: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Environment" instead
Parameter $node of method Drupal\potion\Twig\NodeVisitor\TranslationNodeVisitor::doEnterNode() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Node: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Node\Node" instead
Parameter $env of method Drupal\potion\Twig\NodeVisitor\TranslationNodeVisitor::doLeaveNode() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Environment: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Environment" instead
Parameter $node of method Drupal\potion\Twig\NodeVisitor\TranslationNodeVisitor::doLeaveNode() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Node: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Node\Node" instead
Parameter $body of method Drupal\potion\Twig\NodeVisitor\TranslationNodeVisitor::compileString() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Node: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Node\Node" instead

Parameter $options of method Drupal\potion\Twig\NodeVisitor\TranslationNodeVisitor::getContext() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Node_Expression_Array: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Node\Expression\ArrayExpression" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
